completionInfo.openDescAdmin: Completing your application account provides all company members with access to B2B features like quoting, company users management, quick order, and more.

completionInfo.underReviewDesc: Your company is under verification. Please contact your company admin for further details.

completionInfo.timeExpiredDescAdmin: You haven't update your documents. Please update your documents to continue shopping in Medbiz.
completionInfo.timeExpiredDesc: Your company hasn't update their document. Please contact your company admin for further details.

completionInfo.hasExpiredDesc: Your company has expired documents. Please contact your company admin for further details.
